--- Chuck Hinson <chuck.hinson@...> wrote:

> I'm having trouble understanding the interoperability issue.  This is
> HTTP we're talking about here.  How many different web servers do we
> have nowadays?  App servers? Servlet containers?  Maybe I haven't
> been
> paying attention, but I didn't realize there were any major
> interoperability issues between them - my browser seems to work with
> just about all of them with no problems.  Why would having multiple
> REST frameworks cause interoperability issues?  

It still happens....

See http://www.stucharlton.com/blog/archives/000126.html

for an example of misinterpreting HTTP and MIME...

Cheers
Stu
